pages.text: 71|12|ebam tini tomaderake samrd'dha karabena dhana-sampada o santana-santatite ebam tomadera jan'ya sthapana karabena udyana o prabahita karabena nadi-nala [1].’
71|13|‘Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allahara sresthatbera para'oya karacha na [1]
71|15|Tomara ki laksya karani allah kibhabe srsti karechena sata asamana stare stare bin'yasta kare
71|16|ara sekhane camdake sthapana karechena alokarupe o suryake sthapana karechena pradiparupe
71|18|Tarapara tate tini tomaderake phiriye nebena ebam pare niscitabhabe bera kare nibena
71|19|ara allah tomadera jan'ya yaminake karechena bistrta
71|20|yate tomara sekhane calaphera karate para prasasta pathe.’

71|21|Nuha balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampapradaya to amake aman'ya kareche ebam anusarana kareche emana lokera yara dhana-sampada o santana-santati tara ksati chara ara kichu'i brd'dhi kareni [1].’
71|23|ebam baleche, ‘tomara kakhano parityaga karo na tomadera upasyaderake; parityaga karo na oyad, su'oya‘a, iyagucha, iya‘uka o nasarake [1].’
71|24|‘Bastuta tara anekake bibhranta kareche; kaje'i apani yalimadera bibhranti chara ara kichu'i brd'dhi karabena na [1].’
71|25|Tadera aparadhera jan'ya taderake nimajjita kara hayechila ebam pare taderake prabesa karano hayechila agune, atahpara tara allah byatita an'ya ka'uke'o sahayyakari payani.
71|26|Nuh ara'o balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Yaminera kaphiradera madhya theke kono grhabasike abyahati debena na [1].
71|27|Apani taderake abyahati dile tara apanara bandaderake bibhraanta karabe ebam janma dite thakabe sudhu duskrtikari o kaphira.

71|28|He amara raba! Apani ksama karuna amake, amara pitamatake ebam yara mumina haye amara ghare prabesa kare taderake ebam mumina purusa o mumina nariderake; ara yalimadera sudhu dhbansa'i brd'dhi karuna.’
